1.title: Full Stack Flutter Developer
1.description: Experience in designing and implementing user-centered solutions. Development focus, user-centered, adherence to agile practices, and focus on scalability ensure NeaterNotes offers the ideal experience to its users.

2.title: Mobile Developer
2.description: Development of mobile applications with hybrid and native technologies. Implementation of RESTful services, Auth0, Storage. Integration of third-party services like Firebase and deployment in app stores (Google Play Store, Apple Store)

3.title: CTI - UX/UI Designer - Web Developer

4.title: Content Creator - Social Media
